verbs.description: [ARG0: local boxer] [R-ARG0: who] [V: fought] [ARG2: tyson] speaks out about killing man a former boxer in cleveland who once fought mike tyson is speaking out exclusively to the fox 8 i team about shooting and killing a man in self - defense and he showed us that someone just broke into his home and even stole some of his boxing memorabilia tyson abdul rahman andrew easley mike tyson
